pr_title: [10.10] NXP-28869: Add a new API to refresh AWS tokens in the batch handler

timeline.bodyText: Even if it's not required you should also have an @Override here. The code should be as similar to master as possible except for required changes.
timeline.author: efge

timeline.message:
NXP-28869: Add a new API to refresh AWS tokens in the batch handler

The new API can be used from `/upload/{batchId}/refreshToken`.
It will return new tokens when the batch handler can
handle the request, else it will throw an error.
